评论详情: My 17 year old is in love with this shirt, as you know not easy to please a teenager. She actually wore this her first day of her junior year this year. It was soft and a great fit
Didn’t look close enough when ordering but it doesn’t spell MARTINI as you would expect it spells MNRTINI and also ollves instead of olives
I like this top! It’s def not cropped but it is shorter than a regular tee- I got a large and cut it up to my preferences for an oversized boho casual look! Very soft too!

This tee is super cute and comfortable. The lobster design is cute and fun. The fit is great if you are going for a relaxed look. Fabric is soft and breathable, making it nice for casual wear. The material is decent quality but I would hand wash it to make it last as long as possible.

评论概述: fits oversized exactly as pictured, print looks colourful and clear
评论详情: big fan of this t-shirt: exactly as pictured in terms of the print and sizing. I usually wear a size 4-6 US (small), but sized up to a Medium and got the exact loose fit that's pictured in the photo. The material is very soft and on the thinner side (which i like more than thick cotton t-shirts). Great shirt, recommend!
This graphic tee definitely surpassed my expectations! The Fabric is so rich! I loved it!!! Can't wait to style it!
the shirt itself is cute but its very see through and the print feels cheap

评论概述: Was not as oversized as I wanted
评论详情: This shirt is fine. The quality of the shirt itself is pretty good and the design on the front is well done but the sizing is a bit off. I wanted this shirt to be more oversized, especially because it’s advertised as an oversized shirt but it really just fits like a normal shirt. A bit disappointing. Notnonadorennxjxx by
The design is a part of the fabric, which to me is indicative of a better quality shirt. It also is pretty soft. The white is a little see through.

This y2k-style tee is so cute! The material feels very silky, quite different from the usual cotton-like feel and is only slightly see-through. The pattern is bold and looks exactly like it does online as it does in-person. Fits perfectly, hits right at the hips. Overall, I love this t-shirt! it's a modest oversized version of the y2k baby tees that are popular right now.

I like this shirt! The design is adorable and perfect for a cute, aesthetic look with its print. The length nice, providing a comfortable and relaxed oversized fit, ideal for casual wear. The material is lightweight and breathable, making it perfect for summer, but it's a bit see-through and feels a little cheap. Despite this, it's still a cute top to wear out.

The graphic and fit were as pictured, but I should have been cautious with the polyester material. It feels like kid's pajamas, with a bit of sheen. It's also not the burnout style fabric.  As with many oversized tees, you either have to be tall so that it doesn't become snug at the hips, or prepare to tuck appropriately. Cute print but not for super hot weather. Decent value for the price.
Very cute shirt, super nice and comfortable to wear for everyday use! Love the oversized look, got a medium and fits like a large!
Short doesn’t say “Martini” but “Mnrtini” and “olives” is spelled “ollves”. Returning.

I love how this shirt looks and feels. The design is so cute and unique. It is perfect for a lounging or going out. It is also so comfortable and feels so soft on your skin. It’s also good quality and great for your money.
